name: 隐秘世界
description:
Background

Only a small number of people know the truth of the world. The people who have Super-Powers formed into 8 different factions and control this world surreptitiously. These people now come together for a same purpose: taking over the whole world and dominating all the factions.

How to play

UnderWorld is a card game that designed for two players. To begin the battle, each player needs to draw 5 cards from two of the factions first and utilize these cards to fullfill the winning conditions.

Both side of the players need to fight for several objectives such as obtaining fightest points and holding the most district cards through sending out character cards with strategies to beat the opponents. Through expanding influences on those districts or beating opponents' characters, the corresponding points will be gained. The first player who receives 8 points will win the games.
